SELECT * FROM zx_merchant_funds_recharge_record mfrr LEFT JOIN zx_merchants_account ma on mfrr.user_id = ma.user_id LEFT JOIN zx_recharge_mode rm on mfrr.recharge_mode = rm.recharge_mode LEFT JOIN zx_employee_basic_information ebi on ebi.employees_id = mfrr.operating_staff_id WHERE mfrr.user_id = #{user_id} AND mfrr.recharge_sequence_number = #{references_the_internal_serial_number1}

SELECT * FROM zx_merchant_funds_withdrawal_record mfwr LEFT JOIN zx_merchants_account ma on mfwr.user_id = ma.user_id LEFT JOIN zx_withdrawal_mode wm on mfwr.cash_withdrawal = wm.withdrawal_mode WHERE mfwr.user_id = #{user_id} AND mfwr.withdrawal_sequence_number = #{references_the_internal_serial_number1}

SELECT * FROM zx_merchant_funds_platform_settlement_record mfps LEFT JOIN zx_clearing_fee_mode cfc on mfps.classification_of_settlement_expenses = cfc.clearing_fee_mode LEFT JOIN zx_merchants_account ma on mfps.user_id = ma.user_id LEFT JOIN zx_employee_basic_information ebi on ebi.employees_id = mfps.employees_id WHERE mfps.user_id = #{user_id} AND mfps.withdrawal_serial_number = #{references_the_internal_serial_number1}

SELECT * FROM zx_merchant_funds_receivable mfr LEFT JOIN zx_merchants_account ma on mfr.user_id = ma.user_id WHERE mfr.user_id = #{user_id} AND mfr.serial_number = #{references_the_internal_serial_number1}
